content.rendered:
What is Garlicoin

Garlicoin (GRLC) is a cryptocurrency that was the result of a Reddit post receiving over 30,000 upvotes.

If this post gets 30,000 upvotes, I will make a garlic bread cryptocurrency called garlicoin

The post easily cleared 30,000 upvotes – by about 16,000, actually – and the OP actually began working on the new, garlic-themed cryptocurrency. Garlicoin is a project that forked from Litecoin and continues the efforts of many in the cryptocurrency community to build ASIC-resistant coins.

Garlicoin Wallet

Manage your crypto wisely! Learn how to setup Atomic Wallet to send, receive, exchange and buy cryptocurrency.
